creditline: Gift of Mrs. George P. Douglas
markings: Recto: LL corner, written diagonally [this drawing was made for the Century Co by Jos Pennell G.H. Whittle Associate Art Ed]; LL, pencil inscription, erased-unreadable; LR, in pencil [Blackboard and Masters Seat Old School Room Harrow]; Verso: LL, collector\'s mark, \'D\'; Douglas\'; across top margin in blue pencil [Old School room - Harrow Blackboard & Masters desk]; black crayon; circled --[S & N, 8481]; violet ink stamped: [ART DEPARTMENT THE CENTURY CO. ---- SQUARE, NEW YORK CITY.]
medium: Pen and black ink on paper
title: Old School Room Harrow
